single_crochet in every st 18 finish with a slip_stitch fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing assembly sew the flaps onto the body using only the slip_stitch and the 2 single_crochet on each side of the slip_stitch this would help the flaps to stay up in between rounds 4-5 of the body i used pins to locate the perfect location before i started sewing pull a long threat of black yarn throw a stitch of what is going to be the center of the back between rounds 11-12 locate the center of the face and put a pin between rounds 7-8 mark with 2 pins between rounds 8-9 2 spaces that are 3 stitches away from the above center now following the path of where the flaps start mark 2 points in each side between rounds 11-12 now pass the black threat on a stitch before any of the marked spaces of rounds 11-12 pull it though the mark stitch and pass it back though the initial stitch coming out from the pin stitch insert your needle through the other marked pin on rounds 11-12 and come out through the center pin of rounds 7-8 the 3 marked spaces on top would be used to hold the mouth after securing the mouth you would need to come out a space before the last pin on rounds 11-12 pass the needle through and come out thought the same space then just pull the needle though the same hole on the back where we initially started now embroid the eyes between rounds
